p: In general terms, these molecules showed little or no activity except for HTNV. Series 2 derivatives ( Figure 1) showed most interesting EC 50 values, so we performed the same broad antiviral screening on a series of 2-phenyl-benzotriazole from our library (3k-n and 4k-n) [ 21] or newly synthetized (3f, j and 4f, j), all showed in Figure 2, in order to better understand the role of substituent in position C5 and C6 on the benzotriazole moiety and describe structure-activity relationships (SARs).
